title: Anyone know what software I can use for Korean audio on champs/announcer?
body: ^ something that does not break the rules

replies.body: So how do I use it? :O

I just tried it now I only changed the audio to Korean and I still get the same error before the launch screen that doesn't go away. When I change the audio only, it still changed the language hence getting the error. It was always working before this patch and now, it has just stopped working for some odd reason.
Are you saying you are on Korean now and it's still working for you? What the hell how is this happening? :(
It says it only supports the legacy client, will it be getting an update to be compatible with the new client?
